anime.description: * Original work and directional debut at the theatrical stage of Final Fantasy and Science Ninja Team Gatchaman illustrator http://anidb.net/cr4482 [Amano Yoshitaka]. Story is set after the Jinshou (Buddhist divine generals) were defeated by darkness and became lost in time. After the world descended into chaos, Zan, a samurai with no memories, discovers his calling and assembles fellow soldiers who can cross through time and space. Together, they take on the legions of darkness. Source: ANN While a minute long trailer was released, the feature length film was never produced.

tag.name: development hell
tag.description: Due to unforeseen circumstances, the production or release of this anime has been pushed back, stalled, or cancelled one or more times from when it was first announced. While some of them have eventually been completed, others might have only had a trailer released or have been changed into another format (e.g. a TV series turned into an OVA). Common reasons for a work to become stuck in development hell include creative differences, legal issues, financial problems, scheduling conflicts or the death of an involved creator.
